tour_name: Himalayan Heights: Nepal, Bhutan & India Mountain Journey

sections.title: Kathmandu and Pokhara: A Cultural Immersion
sections.content: Begin your Himalayan honeymoon with an immersive experience in Nepal. Discover the spiritual heart of Kathmandu, visiting sacred sites like Pashupatinath Temple and the awe-inspiring Boudhanath Stupa. Witness ancient rituals and vibrant traditions. Journey to the serene city of Pokhara, nestled beside Phewa Lake. Enjoy a private boat ride on the lake, framed by the majestic Annapurna range. Indulge in romantic dinners with breathtaking mountain vistas. Savor the local culture with private traditional cooking classes and guided tours of local markets.

sections.title: Annapurna Foothills Trek: Intimate Nature Escape
sections.content: Embark on a gentle and unforgettable honeymoon trek through the Annapurna foothills. Hike through picturesque landscapes with unparalleled views of the snow-capped Himalayas. Enjoy intimate candlelit dinners in cozy mountain lodges, immersed in the tranquility of nature. Experience personalized yoga and meditation sessions amidst the stunning scenery. Enjoy romantic picnics with carefully prepared local cuisine against the backdrop of the Himalayan peaks.

sections.title: Bhutan: The Land of Happiness - Paro and Punakha
sections.content: Fly to Bhutan and land in Paro Valley. Start your Bhutanese experience with a guided hike to the iconic Paro Taktsang (Tiger's Nest Monastery), an unforgettable spiritual journey. Then, travel to Punakha, the ancient capital. Visit the magnificent Punakha Dzong, a stunning fortress at the confluence of two rivers. Enjoy romantic, private riverside dinners under the stars, savoring authentic Bhutanese cuisine. Indulge in traditional hot stone baths for ultimate relaxation.

sections.title: Thimphu: A Blend of Tradition and Modernity
sections.content: Explore Thimphu, Bhutan's capital city, a unique blend of tradition and modernity. Witness the colossal Buddha Dordenma statue, offering panoramic views of the valley. Explore the vibrant local markets, discovering unique handicrafts and local produce. Enjoy a private archery lesson, Bhutan's national sport. Savor exquisite Bhutanese cuisine with personalized menus and private dining experiences. Enjoy a private cultural performance with traditional Bhutanese music and dance.

sections.title: Darjeeling: Tea, Romance, and Himalayan Views
sections.content: Cross into India and journey to Darjeeling, renowned for its lush tea plantations and breathtaking Himalayan vistas. Embark on a romantic ride on the iconic toy train, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Visit a tea garden for a private tea-tasting experience. Take a romantic stroll through the gardens and sample the local cuisine. Enjoy private sunrise viewings with champagne breakfasts overlooking the majestic Himalayan peaks.

sections.title: Gangtok, Sikkim: Himalayan Splendor and Serenity
sections.content: Discover Gangtok, the captivating capital of Sikkim, blessed with awe-inspiring views of Kanchenjunga. Visit the Rumtek Monastery, one of the most important Tibetan Buddhist monasteries. Enjoy a leisurely walk along the charming M.G. Marg, soaking in the local atmosphere. Indulge in private meditation sessions with local monks, promoting inner peace. Enjoy a private tour to a local farm and enjoy a cooking class with local chefs.

sections.title: Delhi and Agra: History, Heritage, and Timeless Romance
sections.content: Conclude your Himalayan honeymoon in India, starting with the vibrant city of Delhi. Explore historical landmarks like the Red Fort and Qutub Minar, delving into India's rich past. Journey to Agra to witness the breathtaking Taj Mahal at sunrise, a symbol of eternal love. Enjoy a private sunset dinner overlooking the Taj Mahal, creating an unforgettable romantic experience. Indulge in a couples spa treatment inspired by ancient Ayurvedic traditions, ensuring ultimate relaxation and rejuvenation. In Delhi, indulge in a culinary adventure with a private food tour, exploring the diverse flavors of Indian cuisine and dining at Michelin star restaurants.
